channel.title: I need help with using the webclient
channel.description: for some reason (probably a simple one - i'm 13 and a newbie at this stuff) i can't seem to login on the server ip: 127.0.0.1. can anyone help me login because it says my server is down and try to make my own. if you can answer this question try to make it the most simplistic way you can write it such that i can understand. ps dont post tutorials i tried them they are too hard to read. :confused: :(

item.title: I need help with using the webclient
item.dc:creator: @baller305 baller305
item.description:
@baller305 wrote:

try loggin in on 0.0.0.0 as server ip or just leave server ip on blank

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with using the webclient
